title: Honour enemy team
body:
So this has probably been asked before but can we get a system where we can give some sort of honour to enemy players. Say something along the lines of 'Positive Attitude' or similar??

Just had a game of ARAM where one poor guy on the enemy side had 4 bots on his team but he refused to give up and instead of getting pissed off kept a positive vibe going.

replies.body:
i really want to upvote this as i like the way the honnor system has been going and feel that they need to continune the way the have been going with it.
i would like to ask tho what your view is have you found the honnor system is working thus far?
would there maybe be an extra glow for honnorable opponents?
how do we stop trolls from abusing it and people possible farming it?

You can pretty much farm the honour system now with premade teams or clubs, players giving each other honours instead of those that deserve it so I think being able to honour opponents shouldn't be a problem.

When the new Honour system came up Riot did say they had plans to add opponent honours into it at some point, can't recall if there's been any update on when that might be though. I think it was mentioned in an Ask Riot post several weeks ago, might be some time frame to go off from there.

I'll see what I can dig up.

EDIT: Found that Ask Riot post I was talking about: https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-au/2017/11/ask-riot-victorious-champions/

Basically, opponent honouring isn't on Riot's "to-do-now" list, they just seem to be focusing on making improvements for what's already there. Hopefully once the new season has started and been ongoing for a couple months they'll start to revisit adding honour for opponents into the system, *maybe* have it by/for the mid-season update if that happens.
Yeah their To-Do-Now list is full of trying to make more money out of the people who play the game.

Honestly don't know why it was removed to be honest.

Other then the fact that "honor one person" is the aim of the new system.

Oh yeah and it's not like it just get's abused how it is, and that premades generally just keep their own honor's.
